mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id AS targetId, u.nickname, pi.image_url AS profileImageUrl, u.profile_bio AS profileBio, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FOLLOW WHERE following = u.user_id) AS followerCnt, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FOLLOW WHERE follower = u.user_id) AS followingCnt FROM USER u LEFT JOIN USER_PROFILE_IMAGE pi ON u.user_id = pi.user_id WHERE u.user_id = #{targetId}
